document_data.name: Gundar Silvershine
document_data.mainbody: '''Gundar Silvershine''' was an outlander living in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Gem of Zakhara|54}}
document_data.Activities:
Gundar owned and operated [[Abas for All]]. He possessed the weaving skill to accurately depict [[dragon]]s and [[wyvern]]s on cloth which was a rare talent in Golden Huzuz. Much of the court found these creature bizarre, so he kept plenty of common [[aba]]s for sale as well.

Since coming to the Land of Fate, Gundar became [[Zakharan pantheon|Enlightened]], following the teachings of [[Jauhar]].
document_data.History: Originally from a distant land called [[Cormyr]], Gundar served a barbarian king named [[Azoun Obarskyr IV|Azoun]]. His greed got the better of him and Gundar was forced to flee his homeland when he was caught stealing from the crown.
